item.title: Power BI Dashboard: Analyzing Sales, Returns, and Customer Performance
item.description: In an increasingly data-driven world, the ability to analyze and visualize complex datasets is a skill of great value. In this article, I present my Power BI project, which focuses on analyzing sales performance, returns, and customer behavior. This project not only demonstrates my proficiency in Power BI but also showcases my data analysis and visualization skills. Project Overview Power BI Dashboard Main Page The main page serves as the central hub of the dashboard.
